title: 99: Bekah’s BFF
itunes:title: 99: Bekah’s BFF
description:
Bekah is joined by her best friend, Nick Leng, as a co-host! They chat about their history together, get honest about some friendship shifts after “The Bachelor", talk Nick’s musical career journey, and answer some of the #broadsquad’s questions! 
ABOUT NICK LENG: 
Follow Nick: @nick_leng
And find his music here: https://music.apple.com/us/artist/nick-leng/960778942
